@samAsa: aXika-kroXaH = bahuvrIhiH samAsaH (aXikaH kroXaH yasya saH)

@hindi_@meaning: XadZakane vAlA, kiFciwa PadZakane vAlA (hAWa / BujA)
sIwA ke sAWa saMgama kA Sakuna bawAne vAlA, BaviRya kaWana karane vAlA (hAWa / BujA)
@samAsa: sIwA-safgama-Samsini =  RaRTI (saMbanXa) wawpuruRa samAsaH (sIwAyAH saMgamasya Samsini)

@hindi_@meaning: vaha jo bAyAz (hAWa) nahIM, arWAwa xAyAz hAWa
@samAsa: savya-iware = bahuvrIhiH samAsaH (savyaH (@left) iwaraH (@other @than) yasmAw (@that); @the @hand @that @was @other @than @His (@Lord @Rama'@s) @left @hand; @implying @His @right @hand. @NOTE - iwaraH @will @NOT @be @a sarvanAma Sabxa @because @in @a bahuvrIhiH samAsaH @ending @with @a sarvanAma, @the sarvanAma @loses @its @identity.

@hindi_@meaning: ni_Kan1_pp_skyA; GusA xiyA (jamAnA, sWira karanA, GusedZanA, GusA xenA)
